name: Hal 9000
description: Fictional artificial intelligence character and the main antagonist in Arthur C. Clarke and Stanley Kubrick's Space Odyssey series. HAL 9000 controls the systems of the Discovery One Spacecraft and interacts with the ship's astronaut crew. Early Access Uncommon: The 1st edition of this card was redeemed during the Early Access event. Unredeemed cards have been burned. Once obtained, it can be traded normally.
